Before joining Google a decade ago, Eric Schmidt served as an exec at computer networking maker Novell( NOVL) and Sun Microsystems, which is now owned by Oracle( ORCL). My estimate is that Eric Schmidt likes to be in the game. He likes to be a player, said Roger Kay . It's unlikely Eric Schmidt will retire with his billions, taking up sailing or traveling. Indeed, there's a rumor he's trying to land a gig on cable television.

Hillary Clinton Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), who recently took over Hillary Clinton 's former seat on the Senate Armed Services Committee, also worried today about decreased funding of the Marines: The Marine Corps must have the resources it needs to respond to new and emerging cyber threats and terror threats in different parts of the world. Secretary Robert Gates will explain his vision to the committee next week, and I look forward to working with him to ensure the Marine Corps is well-positioned to respond to the new security demands that will continue to emerge, Kirsten Gillibrand said in a statement.
